general_advisory: Start sowing the summer crops when the temperature is conducive for germination.

advisory: Due to diurnal variation in temperature, there is a chance of Blast in Rice, manage this by applying Tricyclazole 0.6 g/liter of water.
Postpone/provide irrigation to promote more tillers.
Due to rise in temperature, provide irrigation when thin hair-like carakes form in the field. Run cono weeder to control the weeds.
Due to weather survey, there may be infestation of YMV disease. Manage this by applying Ridomil MZ @ 2g/liter of water.
Due to rise in temperature, provide irrigation at critical stages of Knee height stage.
To manage the Stem borer, release T. Chilonis card @ 20,000/ac and repeat it after 10 days of first release.
Provide irrigation due to rise in temperature for easing Peg penetration and pod development.
After flowering, do not practice intercultivation work.
For good seed filling, apply 2-3 g of Borax/liter of water.
Due to diurnal variation in temperature, after 3-4 weeks of planting finger millet, apply 8 kg of Nitrogen per acre.
Due to rise in temperature, provide the animal shed clean and sufficient drinking water.
Maintain cleanliness in the animal shed.
Due to temperature effect in brinjal, Foot & Shoot borer can be managed by application of Neem based pesticides 330 ppm @ 1 liter per acre.
Due to weather, there may be an attack of Mites, manage this by spraying Dicofol @ 3 ml/liter of water.
Due to rise in temperature, survey for oxygen deficit may be there.
